text: thm 'arsalna musaa wa'akhah harun biayatina altise why: aleasa walyd waljarad walqummal waldafadie waldam waltwfan walsnwn wanaqs min althmrat, hjtan byint taqhar alqulub ftnqad laha qulub almwmnyn, wataqum alhujat ealaa almeandyn, arslnahma 'iilaa fireawn hakim "msr" washraf qwmh, fastakbaruu ean al'iiman bmwsa wakhyh, wakanuu qwmana mttawlyn ealaa alnaas qahryn lahum balzlm
